gen:link.msg:message: `Liabilities` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLiabilitiesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_Liabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLiabilitiesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_Liabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLiabilitiesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLiabilitiesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLiabilitiesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLiabilitiesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfLiabilitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
